phrases: Teach Me How to Play Shogi (Continued)
Next I will introduce the characteristics of each type of cat.
He is a hard worker who moves ahead one step at a time-meow!
I may be the weakest piece,
My meaty paw punch will knock you silly-meow!
but there are scenarios where you cannot win without me, so I am quite important-meow.
He is a single-minded fellow who is as straight as an arrow!
I will go straight ahead as far as you like!
He can hop right and left!
Only I can jump over the heads of enemies and allies alike-meow!
I hop and then let loose a kangaroo punch!
A cool guy with a little bit of an attitude!
When it comes to cool attacks, I am a star!
I am good for both offense and defense-meow!
But I am wide open from the back and sides-meow.
The confident bodyguard who protects the king!
I like being near the king!
I am the honest cat who has nothing to hide-meow.
And I love getting close to and then capturing the enemy king, too.
I can fly both horizontally and vertically-meow!
I am popular with men and women of all ages-meow!
A heavyweight missile who is effective diagonally as far as the eye can see!
I am a lonely guy who is always risking his life.
Just be careful, because when I am attacking, my defense might be weak.
Without me, there will not even be a game.
So do not leave me alone-meow!
If I get captured, the game's over-meow.
Only the king can move in every direction?
After all, he is the king!
But also when needed, he is a great fighter in his own right!
So each piece has its own personality!
And moreover, the awesome thing about these Shogi Land Kitties
is that when they advance step by step and finally reach the enemy camp...
J-Just one more step to the enemy's camp-meow...
Pawn > Promoted Pawn (has the same abilities as Gold!!)
But this book is pretty easy to understand.
Written and Illustrated by Harunobu Nikaidou
N-N-N-N-Nikaidou, do not tell me you...
Yeah, I wrote and drew it.
I wish I could draw like that!
I wonder if my drawings are easy to understand.
Actually, I have loved to draw ever since I was a kid.
I wanted to contribute to the popularization of my hobby,
And so, I even asked the Daitokyo Printing Company to throw it together simply like this,
then distributed copies to relatives at the Nikaidou Family New Year's party.
Deluxe edition With Gold Leaf UV Processing Cloth Back Cover Spin Endpapers Endsheets Flower pattern-bound spine Trans TUVC Embossed
I am just glad they were interested.
Well, the best thing to do is introduce the detailed rules as they go.
This being the first day, I am pleased with what we accomplished.
In general, we did a good job.
This is how you build the future, taking one small step at a time!
Um, the station is not this way.
How far do you intend to accompany me?
Why would I shy away from sleeping over at my best friend's place?
But let us try to shy away!
And I am not your best friend.
Well, do not worry about it.
Put that in front of the closet on the right side.
Here are some late-night snacks, and breakfast for both of you.
I could not help being concerned about your apartment's lack of daily necessities, Kiriyama.
Thinking this would be a good opportunity, I picked something out.
This is an excellent bed that folds up into a couch.
I realize it came late, but this is my housewarming gift to you!
Teach Me How to Play Shogi
What do I do now, huh?
Nikaidou is not with you today?
Did you take all those impassioned lines and etch them in your heart, Kiriyama?
Friendship truly is a wonderful thing, is not it?
Whoa, just thinking about it again pulls on the old heartstrings.
Does not even have the energy to deny it anymore
I was at my teacher's birthday party the day it aired,
but we all watched the recording that night.
If you really want to win, then persevere!
Do not just attack, you have to defend!
Water coming out of my eyes?
This is what I hate about getting old.
I am telling you, we had a room full of adults bawling like babies.
I heard after the broadcast, Nikaidou had a bout of anemia and could not get to his feet.
He must have used up a lot of energy.
It is kind of annoying since not one bit of it reaches your heart.
He will probably get promoted this season.
Right now, his head is probably filled with the thought of facing off against you in C1.
If I do not hold my ground here, I will just slide down until I reach the point of demotion.
If you get a demotion, it will not get erased unless you have more wins the following season.
If you get demoted twice, you drop down one class.
The battle to paint over a loss is even more exhausting than the battle to move forward.
I witnessed my adoptive father go through that seesawing struggle
under the same roof for years after he was downgraded from B1.
Take better care of your shogi, and yourself!
Where does Nikaidou's energy come from?
It is not like his body is particularly strong.
Is it that he does not doubt himself?
That passion, always driving him on tenaciously...
Whenever I am with him, I feel suffocated.
And I gradually get disgusted with myself.
He did such a great job drawing it.
It sounds like Hina and Momo both had fun.
My meaty paw punch will knock you silly-meow!
The kitty does not like that!
They even put copies of the picture book on the fridge
so they can remember the moves.
How often does anybody get the chance to be tutored by two professionals?
Maybe they will become incredibly strong.
But I cannot let them beat me.
I just wish those two guys would teach me.
What is going on with today's world?
After all, it seems like he is looking forward to playing shogi with his granddaughters.
When I think about it like that, shogi really is marvelous.
It is been around for hundreds of years, and even now,
as long as you have the board and pieces, you can enjoy it at home.
Moreover, once you learn how to play, it does not matter whether
you are an adult or a child.
You can have fun playing earnestly.
Akari's words prompted an image of my father to cross my mind.
His body would rock back and forth gently,
with his arms folded and his left hand on his cheek.
It was a natural habit that would appear whenever he was focused.
I enjoyed watching him when he was like that.
But I could only see it when I did my very best,
after studying so much that it made my head spin.
But I wanted to see that habit, so I desperately tried my best.
Kind, considerate of the people around him, always smiling...
I saw his true face, stripped of all social niceties.
What would Dad say if he could see me right now?
How could I have forgotten that?
When I was little, I saw lightning in the middle of the day.
It was a fleeting gleam of light that seemed to tumble like liquid silver across the blue sky.
That one moment captivated my heart.
What an odd thing to say.
Is it so strange for a big sister to worry for her little brother and check on him
after he is begun living alone?
I will walk you to the station.
You are not going to let me in?
After I have come all this way.
If there is nothing to show, it cannot be messy, right?
I need to go to the bathroom!
Do not make me spell it all out for you, idiot!
Hey, how old is this place?
It looks like a dump from the outside, but it is surprisingly clean inside.
But the landlord just had it renovated.
Hey, Rei, get me a towel.
So why did you choose this town?
It is not like you have any connections here, right?
I came here once for work.
I liked it because of the big, beautiful river.
I cannot remember, were you a fan of rivers?
We lived under the same roof for ten years, but it is like I barely know anything about you.
The air conditioner is old, so it does not work well.
This is a fine feather futon!
You must have just gotten it.
It does not smell like you yet.
Is this really the sixth floor?
Is it because the river is so low?
So this is where you have been living.
You looked for it by yourself, decided on it yourself...
You really are self-centered, are not you?
He has a soft spot for you.
Why do not you go back home...
It would make Dad happier that way.
Did you and Dad have a fight?
I mean, I have not seen him.
I have not been home lately.
Are you still with that guy?
It did not leave a scar at least.
Gotou is not a sane guy.
That is none of your business.
He does not get violent with you?
And he would never wake up again.
But you have a match today, do not you?
He will not move to the free class even after falling to C1,
and keeps sticking it out, desperately, I guess you could say.
I saw him play against Dad once.
It was like he was holding on for dear life.
But not quitting, even after all of that...
He must really love shogi, you know?
I hear if Mr. Matsunaga is demoted from C1, he will finally retire.
It is like you are going over there to strangle an old, senile dog.
Nobody wants to be the one to do the job.
It kind of makes you worry.
I thought that in a situation like this, maybe you are the type to throw the match.
Because you are such a nice guy.
As she left, the sun shone through her hair, illuminating it for a moment.
And that light eventually brought on a pounding rain.
A professional shogi player for forty years.
I wonder how he feels right now.
Do not miss the next episode of March Comes in Like a Lion either!
Please get a copy of Harunobu Nikaidou's Shogi for Beginners Picture Book.
